pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Manipulation Extensions of 'Dplyr' and 'Tidyr' // If 'dplyr' is a grammar for data manipulation, 'extdplyr' is like a short paragraph written in 'dplyr'. 'extdplyr' extends 'dplyr' and 'tidyr' verbs to some common "routines" that manipulate data sets. It uses the same interface and preserves all the features from 'dplyr', has good performance, and supports various data sources.
